plurals.name: permission_denied_message
plurals.item: Permission denied. Please try again after grant the %s permission.
Permissions denied. Please try again after grant %s permissions.

plurals.name: permission_set_in_settings_message
plurals.item: Permission required. Grant permission to this application and try again: Open app info page in settings, tap 'Permissions', enable %s permission.
Permissions required. Grant permissions to this application and try again: Open app info page in settings, tap 'Permissions', enable %s permissions.
